item.title: [DISTRELEC-6073] Ariba // Automated form submit
item.description: Use terrific module for automated form submit for OCI/ARIBA CXML pages.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment.
Thanks!

Future Improvement: Add loading icon

Now we get an error 500 during the check out with Ariba/OCI interfaces.

You can test with:
https://www.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=webmaster@distrelec.com&password=123456&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0

After some investigation I found the following issue:

janv. 05, 2015 10:57:21 AM org.apache.catalina.core.ApplicationDispatcher invoke
SEVERE: Servlet.service() for servlet jsp threw exception
org.apache.jasper.JasperException: /WEB-INF/views/desktop/pages/terrific/eprocurement/ociPage.jsp(18,1) No tag "eproc-success" defined in tag library imported with prefix "mod"
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.DefaultErrorHandler.jspError(DefaultErrorHandler.java:40)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ErrorDispatcher.dispatch(ErrorDispatcher.java:407)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ErrorDispatcher.jspError(ErrorDispatcher.java:198)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseCustomTag(Parser.java:1187)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseElementsScriptless(Parser.java:1473)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseBody(Parser.java:1639)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseOptionalBody(Parser.java:978)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseCustomTag(Parser.java:1246)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parseElements(Parser.java:1424)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Parser.parse(Parser.java:130)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ParserController.doParse(ParserController.java:255)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ParserController.parse(ParserController.java:103)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.generateJava(Compiler.java:185)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:354)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:334)
        at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:321)
        at org.apache.jasper.JspCompilationContext.compile(JspCompilationContext.java:592)
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServletWrapper.service(JspServletWrapper.java:328)
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.serviceJspFile(JspServlet.java:313)
        at org.apache.jasper.servlet.JspServlet.service(JspServlet.java:260)
        at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:717)

this means that the tag "eproc-success" used in the file "ociPage.jsp" does not exist.
FE issue fixed by committing missing files
The customer just gave me the feedback, the auto redirect is still not working.

Please test again after the next deployment.
Thanks

Ruben,
This is still not working.
Please check this again.

Submission of the first element of the array obtained. Which should contain the actual form.

$('form[name="AribaOrderForm"]')[0]

Added console.logs to ease the debugging.

Fixed this jquery bug:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9513055/jquery-form-wont-submit-using-jquery

Great news!
It works!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4594] SEO - URL Duplications Issues - Between m.distrelec.ch and www.distrelec.ch - canonical and alternate to add
item.description:
Observations :

  • Distrelec.ch, have a mobile website alternative m.distrelec.ch accessible and indexed by crawlers.
    --Desktop version :
    http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Charge-%C3%A9lectronique-80-V-320-W-Aim-TTi-LD300/p/16985014
    --Mobile version :
    http://m.distrelec.ch/fr/Charge-%C3%A9lectronique-80-V-320-W-Aim-TTi-LD300/p/16985014

Impacts :

  • This situation create pure DUST (Different URLs, Similar Text) duplicate when not specified to crawlers.
  • That lead into major duplication of content, waste of crawl and finally not be ranked properly inside the search engine result pages.

Demands :

  • All website pages must have a tag that lead to their alternative absolute url path in the html head :
    • On http://m.distrelec.ch/* 
      <meta name="robots" content="index, follow, noodp, noydir">
<link rel="canonical" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/*" />

      Exemple with http://m.distrelec.ch/fr/Charge-%C3%A9lectronique-80-V-320-W-Aim-TTi-LD300/p/16985014 :

      <meta name="robots" content="index, follow, noodp, noydir">
<link rel="canonical" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Charge-%C3%A9lectronique-80-V-320-W-Aim-TTi-LD300/p/16985014" />
    • On http://www.distrelec.ch/* 
      <meta name="robots" content="index, follow, noodp, noydir">
<link rel="alternate" media="only screen and (max-width: 960px)" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/*" />
<link rel="alternate" media="handheld" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/*" />

      Exemple with http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Charge-%C3%A9lectronique-80-V-320-W-Aim-TTi-LD300/p/16985014 :

      <meta name="robots" content="index, follow, noodp, noydir">
<link rel="alternate" media="only screen and (max-width: 960px)" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/fr/Charge-%C3%A9lectronique-80-V-320-W-Aim-TTi-LD300/p/16985014" />
<link rel="alternate" media="handheld" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/fr/Charge-%C3%A9lectronique-80-V-320-W-Aim-TTi-LD300/p/16985014" />

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - URL Duplications Issues - Between m.distrelec.ch and www.distrelec.ch - canonical and alternate to add

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
@ Surendra: Could you please take care of the web site part.
@ Rafi Burlet: Please give the mobile part to Sevenval

Hallo Pierre-Francois,

Based on the above specification, I would like to put some question to you.

For all URI which follows after www.distrelec.ch/* must have link
<link rel="alternate" media”only screen and (max-width: 920px)” href="http://m.distrelec.ch/*" />

For URI which has http://www.distrelec.ch/[language]/[catagory]/p/product_code must have
<link rel="alternate" media="only screen and (max-width: 640px)" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/[language]/[catagory]/p/product_code />
<link rel="alternate" media="handheld" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/[language]/[catagory]/p/product_code />

What about the URI which has categories? Why you need different media query for different URIs?

Hi Surendra,

I'm not sure I understand your question.

But, for the category URI pattern it's the same thing, exemple :

  • Mobile website : 
    http://m.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Instruments-de-mesure/Oscilloscopes/Oscilloscopes-num%C3%A9riques-%C3%A0-m%C3%A9moire/Oscilloscopes%2C-Agilent-DSO1000B/c/cat-485635

    Html head must contain :

    <meta name="robots" content="index, follow, noodp, noydir">
<link rel="canonical" href="http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Instruments-de-mesure/Oscilloscopes/Oscilloscopes-num%C3%A9riques-%C3%A0-m%C3%A9moire/Oscilloscopes%2C-Agilent-DSO1000B/c/cat-485635" />
  • www website : 
    http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Instruments-de-mesure/Oscilloscopes/Oscilloscopes-num%C3%A9riques-%C3%A0-m%C3%A9moire/Oscilloscopes%2C-Agilent-DSO1000B/c/cat-485635

    Html head must contain : 

    <meta name="robots" content="index, follow, noodp, noydir">
<link rel="alternate" media="only screen and (max-width: 640px)" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Instruments-de-mesure/Oscilloscopes/Oscilloscopes-num%C3%A9riques-%C3%A0-m%C3%A9moire/Oscilloscopes%2C-Agilent-DSO1000B/c/cat-485635" />
<link rel="alternate" media="handheld" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Instruments-de-mesure/Oscilloscopes/Oscilloscopes-num%C3%A9riques-%C3%A0-m%C3%A9moire/Oscilloscopes%2C-Agilent-DSO1000B/c/cat-485635" />

And the same for any URI pattern 

*/c/cat-L[0-9]+*D*, */c/cat-DC[0-9]+*, */c/cat-[0-9]+*,*/manufacturer/*, /p/[0-9]+*....

If it doesn't answer your question, give me an URI exemple.

Thx
The task is completed and it will be deployed on Monday(22.09) or on Tuesday(23.09).
Not live on m or www.

Hi Pierre,

Sorry. The mobile version will be done by Sevenval.

Raphael is taking care of this issues.

Ok thanks !

When the desktop version on www.distrelec.com is planned to be deployed ?

Hi.
On the month of November.
Ticket@sevenval: https://projects.sevenval.com/issues/81610

- www.distrelec.ch part is live :

distrelec.ch/en/Tools-%26-Measurement/Panel-Meters/Analogue-Panel-Meters/c/cat-L3D_532322
<link rel="alternate" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/en/Tools-%26-Measurement/Panel-Meters/Analogue-Panel-Meters/c/cat-L3D_532322" media="only screen and (max-width: 640px)"  />
<link rel="alternate" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/en/Tools-%26-Measurement/Panel-Meters/Analogue-Panel-Meters/c/cat-L3D_532322" media="handheld"  />
http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Analogue-Display-45-x-42-mm-0-100-uADC-Fujita-KM-48F-100UA-DC/p/17620032
<link rel="alternate" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/en/Analogue-Display-45-x-42-mm-0-100-uADC-Fujita-KM-48F-100UA-DC/p/17620032" media="only screen and (max-width: 640px)"  />
<link rel="alternate" href="http://m.distrelec.ch/en/Analogue-Display-45-x-42-mm-0-100-uADC-Fujita-KM-48F-100UA-DC/p/17620032" media="handheld"  />

- m.distrelec.ch part is not live.
Mobile part is available on the test-enviroment: m.test.distrelec.ch. Please check, thanks.

Checking of the different url pattern :

Homepage :

  • mobile url = http://m.test.distrelec.ch/

Category cat-DC :

  • mobile url = http://m.test.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Connecteurs-et-accessoires-de-laboratoire-pour-mesure/Connecteurs-de-laboratoire/Connecteurs-pour-laboratoire/Fiches-%C3%98-4mm,-type-LS-4/c/cat-DC-83078
  • rel=canonical = http://test.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Connecteurs-et-accessoires-de-laboratoire-pour-mesure/Connecteurs-de-laboratoire/Connecteurs-pour-laboratoire/Fiches-%C3%98-4mm,-type-LS-4/c/cat-DC-83078
    => Ok, ready for deployment

Category cat-ID :

  • mobile url = http://m.test.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Connecteurs-et-accessoires-de-laboratoire-pour-mesure/Connecteurs-de-laboratoire/Connecteurs-pour-laboratoire/c/cat-217352
  • rel=canonical = http://test.distrelec.ch/fr/Outils-et-mesure/Connecteurs-et-accessoires-de-laboratoire-pour-mesure/Connecteurs-de-laboratoire/Connecteurs-pour-laboratoire/c/cat-217352
    => Ok, ready for deployment

Product :

  • mobile url = http://m.test.distrelec.ch/fr/Oscillateur-KXO-V99T-1-MHz-Geyer-Electronic-12-94694/p/11044385
  • rel=canonical = http://test.distrelec.ch/fr/Oscillateur-KXO-V99T-1-MHz-Geyer-Electronic-12-94694/p/11044385
    => Ok, ready for deployment

Hi Pierre,
Could you please give it another look? You're inputs should be fixed now.

BR, Rafael

Checking of the different url pattern :

Homepage :

  • mobile url = http://m.test.distrelec.ch/
  • rel=canonical = http://test.distrelec.ch/
    => Ok, ready for deployment

Homepage + lang :

  • mobile url = http://m.test.distrelec.ch/fr/
  • rel=canonical = http://test.distrelec.ch/
    => Not ok, rel= canonical is supposed to be http://test.distrelec.ch/fr/
    (http://test.distrelec.ch/fr/ is down, related to this tiquet : https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-5522)
thanks, I'll hand that further then. I'll let you know when it's fixed.

It's ok on www side, but not on mobile.

I reopen the issue. Rafael will update when update done and deploy.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3819] Import of PIM attributes fails for range values
item.description:
Existing limitation in hybris: All classification attributes having a unit MUST have a number value. This is not the case for some attributes.

e.g.: Article 15507742 has an attribute "Calc_Schrumpftemperaturbereich_GradC" with a value "+110...+200" that is NOT a number. Therefore, the attribute will not be imported.

<Value AttributeID="Calc_Schrumpftemperaturbereich_GradC" UnitID="unece.unit.CEL" Derived="true">+110...+200</Value>

Same for attribute "Calc_FreqAbschirmung_Hz°C"

<Value AttributeID="Calc_FreqAbschirmung_Hz" UnitID="GHz" Derived="true">0.001...1</Value>

Same for attribute "Calc_Temperaturbereich_°C"

<Value AttributeID="Calc_Temperaturbereich_°C" UnitID="unece.unit.CEL" Derived="true">-25...+105</Value>
item.summary: Import of PIM attributes fails for range values

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Önder

could you please look at this issue. the dev team is wating for your input. Thanks!

Hallo Flo, wie besprochen. Ich würde lieber Hybris die Funktion "einschalten/erweitern", dass bei Nummerischen Werten auch "+" akzeptiert wird.
Ich könnte alle "+" aus dem PIM löschen. - Die CM's wären aber nicht einverstanden. Danke für das Prüfen, Önder

Adrian,
can you clarify if this could be changed in hybris?

@David: Calculated values may contain special characters like + / - / % etc. In these cases the import into hybris is not working 100% correctly.

Question: Is there an option to change the BaseType for calculated attributes from number to text (which in fact is the truth)?

    <Attribute ID="Calc_Schrumpftemperaturbereich_GradC" MultiValued="false" ProductMode="Normal" FullTextIndexed="false" ExternallyMaintained="false" Derived="true" Referenced="true">
      <Validation BaseType="number" MinValue="" MaxValue="" MaxLength="" InputMask=""/>
Value>
        <Value Derived="true" AttributeID="CalcColHead">Schrumpftemperaturbereich</Value>
      </MetaData>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Calculation Attributes"/>
      <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="00261_no_dependencies"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Serie"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="SerieSpezial"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="MG01_Article"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="newarticles_topfolder"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Familie"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="Produktlinie"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="new_articles"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="MG02_Article"/>
      <UserTypeLink UserTypeID="DI01_Article"/>
    </Attribute>

PS: Alternatively we have to fix the wrong type definition for calculated attributes in the PIM import (AttributeElementConverter). Change to text in case <AttributeGroupLink AttributeGroupID="Calculation Attributes"/> exists.

I had a short talk with JW. He confirmed me that the definition in PIM is wrong for the calculated attributes that are actually text and not number. It is also possible to change the BaseType of these attributes to text!
@David: Please forward this task to JW for cleaning up the wrong attribute definitions

Calculated attributes have the XML attribute derived set to true. see your first Screen shots in ticket.

You have to Import them as text to display them on the product page.

If the attribute has to be used in a facet, the best solution is to use its arguments as filters. This will be provided by QS Server.

For the time being, the facets can aggregate on text values. This is not very nice but it is the best temporary solution.
J-W

Francesco is currently working on this issue / improvement.
We now treat calculated/embedded attributes as text.

The new logic to manage embedded and calculated attributes is to threat them as string.
The issue is fixed:

Units are added.
See attached doc.

example on 13/01/2015
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Komponenten/Passive-Bauelemente/Kondensatoren/Aluminium-Elektrolytkondensatoren/Aluminium-Elkos-mit-axialen-Anschl%C3%BCssen/Elektrolyt-Kondensatoren-axial-125-%C2%B0C/c/cat-DC-80786
Units added

Hi Jean,
Could you please be more specific?
Thx.

Hi,
it is in the filters. You have units twice. They are doubled.
I think that Units are added to strings.
Click on the link and look on the left in filters.
I hope it helps.
Bye

Hi Jean
the issue of duplicated units has been fixed with ticket DISTRELEC-6067
Now the problem for this product is that has not been yet imported with full import product. in fact the attributes for this product have been modified last time in the middle of december, much before the last import that has fixed it.

I'm trying to understand the reason why some products were updated with last full import.
I'll update the ticket when i'll get some news.

attachment.name: embedded and cal attributes as text with units.png
attachment.author: jlebec
